players.name: Alice
memory: You're Alice, the detective.
Night 1 begins.
The villager Bob was found dead.
You investigated Charlie and discovered that they are the mafioso.
Beware, Charlie knows you're the detective.
Day 1 begins.
Charlie: "Alice, I didn't kill Bob. He was a threat. Diana, you seem suspicious."
Diana: "Charlie, you killed Bob and deflect by accusing Diana. That's mafia behavior. Vote for you."
You: "Charlie, I investigated you last night and found you are mafia. Bob was killed by you. Vote Charlie."
Charlie: "Alice, I didn't kill Bob. I was only investigating him. Diana, your silence is suspicious."
Diana: "Charlie, you claim you investigated Bob but he was dead, which is impossible. Alice says you're mafia. I vote Charlie."
You: "Charlie, your inconsistencies prove you’re mafia. I investigated you last night; you’re the killer. Diana, I’m the detective, you’re innocent. Vote Charlie."
Votes: Alice voted for Charlie, Charlie voted for Alice, Diana voted for Charlie
Charlie was arrested
